meanings.definition: A person or company that reprints something.
meanings.sent1: The reprinters delivered the new copies to the bookstore.
meanings.sent2: I hired a team of reprinters to reproduce the old book.
meanings.sent3: The reprinters joked about making duplicates all day long.
meanings.sent4: The reprinters were like copy machines, churning out pages non-stop.
meanings.sent5: The diligent reprinters worked tirelessly to replicate the original content.

meanings.sent1: The reprinters of the newspaper were busy with the latest edition.
meanings.sent2: I learned about the reprinters of classic novels in my history class.
meanings.sent3: The reprinters faced a challenge when the ink ran out halfway through.
meanings.sent4: The reprinters' task felt like hitting the print button over and over.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the reprinters at work echoed through the printing press room.
